Description.Text: Assambleya Nikitskaya is a friendly 4-star hotel offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of Moscow. Highlights include free Wi-Fi and parking, a 24-hour bar and an excellent location close to the Kremlin. Red Square and the impressive buildings that surround it form a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Included in this is the Kremlin: a sprawling, walled complex featuring Renaissance cathedrals, majestic palaces and impressive fortified towers. Nearby places of interest include Saint Basil's Cathedral, luxury shopping street Tretyakovsky Proyezd, Lenin's Mausoleum, the GUM department store and many museums and theatres. Several metro stations are located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Moscow destinations. The hotel occupies a 20th-century mid-rise property with a sleek glass entrance. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are 20sqm and decorated in a classic style with patterned fabrics, carpeted floors and dark wood furniture. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, mini-bar, safe and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower, bathrobes and slippers. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the 24-hour hotel bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free underground parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
